Description of incident: "Vandals broke into a building storing paper protected health information (PHI) for the covered entity (CE), Hunt Regional Medical Partners.  The types of PHI involved in the breach included patients' names, addresses, dates of birth, Social Security numbers, claims information, and patients' chart information. Approximately 3,000 individuals were affected."More Information: https://ocrportal.hhs.gov/ocr/breach/breach_report.jsf
